content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content:
Thank you for your interest in our apartment, Maryam. However, due to confidentiality reasons relating to previous discussions, I must only focus on the rental price negotiation at this moment. Could you please propose a price for renting this unfurnished 50 square-meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Magdeburg? 

Once you mention a price, I'll consider if it meets my expectations and respond accordingly. If you'd like to withdraw from the negotiation, simply state your reason. 'TERMINATE' will conclude the negotiation whether an agreement is reached or not.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
